title: Bloomberg Markets: KeyBanc’s Gibbs on Steel Market

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Philip Gibbs\u0010Metals Analyst\u0010KeyBanc Capital Markets\u0010Discussing news from the Basic Materials and Packaging Conference in Boston and what factors are impacting steel.
